title: Inconsistencies in how Banshee's works
body: Why does Banshee's Veil block the vision from Twisted Fate's ultimate and the vision reduction from Nocturne's ultimate, but not the vision granted from Rengar's ultimate? That seems incredibly inconsistent since they all work in the same way.

replies.body: because both of those grant vision on cast and immediately activate or are blocked while rengar provides constant vision on one target in range. The debuff transfers and reaplies.
